content: गर्तः, --र्ता, --र्तं [गॄ-तन् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 86</ls>] {@--1@} A hollow, hole, cave; ससत्त्वेषु गर्तेषु <ls>Ms. 4. 47</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 4.">203.</ls> {@--2@} A grave. --र्तः {@--1@} The hollow of the loins. {@--2@} A kind of disease. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country, a part of the {%Trigartas%} <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--4@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A throne. {@--5@} A chariot. {@--6@} A table for playing at dice. {@--7@} A house. {@--8@} The post of an assembly room.
